interestingcomments.content:
Prevent scaffold board from warping? /!/ Hi,

Due to WFH during the pandemic, my partner and I liked the idea of creating our own desk. We saw a lot of creations on Pintrest using scaffold boards.

We bought some boards from a local timber yard and endeavoured to make our own (my partner is an Engineer and has the tools to hand).

Albeit, the first time we made the table top **the wood warped after a couple days**, we looked online and found this could be just due to excess moisture as we'd added a varnish and oil, however it has happened for the second time without adding any liquid.

Can anyone please offer some advice as to why the wood has warped/any preventative measures.

Thanks very much.
